00030 //contains the index value for the first array index of the second row of each edgepoint array.
00031 //Because each edgepoint side has two rows, the outside most row is calculated first, then the inside row.
00032 //For purposes of AI, it may become necessary to avoid this.

00069 void TrashMapEdgepoints()
00070 {
00071       //Primary edgepoints
00072       if( gps1stNorthEdgepointArray )
00073             MemFree( gps1stNorthEdgepointArray );
00074       if( gps1stEastEdgepointArray )
00075             MemFree( gps1stEastEdgepointArray );
00076       if( gps1stSouthEdgepointArray )
00077             MemFree( gps1stSouthEdgepointArray );
00078       if( gps1stWestEdgepointArray )
00079             MemFree( gps1stWestEdgepointArray );
00080       gps1stNorthEdgepointArray                             = NULL;
00081       gps1stEastEdgepointArray                              = NULL;
00082       gps1stSouthEdgepointArray                             = NULL;
00083       gps1stWestEdgepointArray                              =     NULL;
00084       gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize             = 0;
00085       gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize              = 0;
00086       gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize             = 0;
00087       gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize              = 0;
00088       gus1stNorthEdgepointMiddleIndex           = 0;
00089       gus1stEastEdgepointMiddleIndex            = 0;
00090       gus1stSouthEdgepointMiddleIndex           = 0;
00091       gus1stWestEdgepointMiddleIndex            = 0;
00092       //Secondary edgepoints
00093       if( gps2ndNorthEdgepointArray )
00094             MemFree( gps2ndNorthEdgepointArray );
00095       if( gps2ndEastEdgepointArray )
00096             MemFree( gps2ndEastEdgepointArray );
00097       if( gps2ndSouthEdgepointArray )
00098             MemFree( gps2ndSouthEdgepointArray );
00099       if( gps2ndWestEdgepointArray )
00100             MemFree( gps2ndWestEdgepointArray );
00101       gps2ndNorthEdgepointArray                             = NULL;
00102       gps2ndEastEdgepointArray                              = NULL;
00103       gps2ndSouthEdgepointArray                             = NULL;
00104       gps2ndWestEdgepointArray                              =     NULL;
00105       gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize             = 0;
00106       gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize              = 0;
00107       gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize             = 0;
00108       gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize              = 0;
00109       gus2ndNorthEdgepointMiddleIndex           = 0;
00110       gus2ndEastEdgepointMiddleIndex            = 0;
00111       gus2ndSouthEdgepointMiddleIndex           = 0;
00112       gus2ndWestEdgepointMiddleIndex            = 0;

00115 //This final step eliminates some edgepoints which actually don't path directly to the edge of the map.
00116 //Cases would include an area that is close to the edge, but a fence blocks it from direct access to the edge
00117 //of the map.
00118 void ValidateEdgepoints()
00119 {
00120       INT32 i;
00121       UINT16 usValidEdgepoints;
00122       SOLDIERTYPE Soldier;
00123 
00124       memset( &Soldier, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
00125       Soldier.bTeam = 1;
00126 
00127       //north
00128       usValidEdgepoints = 0;
00129       for( i = 0; i < gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
00130       {
00131             if( VerifyEdgepoint( &Soldier, gps1stNorthEdgepointArray[ i ] ) )
00132             {
00133                   gps1stNorthEdgepointArray[ usValidEdgepoints ] = gps1stNorthEdgepointArray[ i ];
00134                   if( i == gus1stNorthEdgepointMiddleIndex )
00135                   { //adjust the middle index to the new one.
00136                         gus1stNorthEdgepointMiddleIndex = usValidEdgepoints;
00137                   }
00138                   usValidEdgepoints++;
00139             }
00140             else if( i == gus1stNorthEdgepointMiddleIndex )
00141             { //increment the middle index because it's edgepoint is no longer valid.
00142                   gus1stNorthEdgepointMiddleIndex++;
00143             }
00144       }
00145       gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize = usValidEdgepoints;
00146       //East
00147       usValidEdgepoints = 0;
