00284 
00285 void CompactEdgepointArray( INT16 **psArray, UINT16 *pusMiddleIndex, UINT16 *pusArraySize )
00286 {
00287       INT32 i;
00288       UINT16 usArraySize, usValidIndex = 0;
00289 
00290       usArraySize = *pusArraySize;
00291 
00292       for( i = 0; i < usArraySize; i++ )
00293       {
00294             if( (*psArray)[ i ] == -1 )
00295             {
00296                   (*pusArraySize)--;
00297                   if( i < *pusMiddleIndex )
00298                   {
00299                         (*pusMiddleIndex)--;
00300                   }
00301             }
00302             else
00303             {
00304                   if( usValidIndex != i )
00305                   {
00306                         (*psArray)[ usValidIndex ] = (*psArray)[ i ];
00307                   }
00308                   usValidIndex++;
00309             }
00310       }
00311       *psArray = (INT16*)MemRealloc( *psArray, *pusArraySize * sizeof( INT16) );
00312       Assert( *psArray );
00313 }
00314 
00315 void InternallyClassifyEdgepoints( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, 
00316                                                                                                        INT16 **psArray1, UINT16 *pusMiddleIndex1, UINT16 *pusArraySize1,
00317                                                                                                        INT16 **psArray2, UINT16 *pusMiddleIndex2, UINT16 *pusArraySize2 )
00318 {
00319       INT32 i;
00320       UINT16 us1stBenchmarkID, us2ndBenchmarkID;
00321       us1stBenchmarkID = us2ndBenchmarkID = 0xffff;
00322       if( !(*psArray2) )
00323       {
00324             *psArray2 = (INT16*)MemAlloc( sizeof( INT16 ) * 400 );
00325       }
00326       for( i = 0; i < *pusArraySize1; i++ )
00327       {
00328             if( sGridNo == (*psArray1)[ i ] )
00329             {
00330                   if( i < *pusMiddleIndex1 )
00331                   { //in the first half of the array
00332                         us1stBenchmarkID = (UINT16)i;
00333                         //find the second benchmark
00334                         for( i = *pusMiddleIndex1; i < *pusArraySize1; i++ )
00335                         {
00336                               if( EdgepointsClose( pSoldier, (*psArray1)[ us1stBenchmarkID ], (*psArray1)[ i ] ) )
00337                               {
00338                                     us2ndBenchmarkID = (UINT16)i;
00339                                     break;
00340                               }
00341                         }
00342                   }
00343                   else
00344                   { //in the second half of the array
00345                         us2ndBenchmarkID = (UINT16)i;
00346                         //find the first benchmark
00347                         for( i = 0; i < *pusMiddleIndex1; i++ )
00348                         {
00349                               if( EdgepointsClose( pSoldier, (*psArray1)[ us2ndBenchmarkID ], (*psArray1)[ i ] ) )
00350                               {
00351                                     us1stBenchmarkID = (UINT16)i;
00352                                     break;
00353                               }
00354                         }
00355                   }
00356                   break;
00357             }
00358       }
00359       //Now we have found the two benchmarks, so go in both directions for each one to determine which entrypoints 
00360       //are going to be used in the primary array.  All rejections will be positioned in the secondary array for 
00361       //use for isolated entry when tactically traversing.
00362       if( us1stBenchmarkID != 0xffff )
00363       {
00364             for( i = us1stBenchmarkID; i > 0; i-- )
00365             {
00366                   if( !EdgepointsClose( pSoldier, (*psArray1)[ i ], (*psArray1)[ i-1 ] ) )
00367                   { //All edgepoints from index 0 to i-1 are rejected.
00368                         while( i )
00369                         {
00370                               i--;
00371                               (*psArray2)[ *pusArraySize2 ] = (*psArray1)[ i ];
00372                               (*pusMiddleIndex2)++;
00373                               (*pusArraySize2)++;
00374                               (*psArray1)[ i ] = -1;
00375                         }
00376                         break;
00377                   }
00378             }
00379             for( i = us1stBenchmarkID; i < *pusMiddleIndex1 - 1; i++ )
00380             {
00381                   if( !EdgepointsClose( pSoldier, (*psArray1)[ i ], (*psArray1)[ i+1 ] ) )
00382                   { //All edgepoints from index i+1 to 1st middle index are rejected.
00383                         while( i < *pusMiddleIndex1 - 1 )
00384                         {
00385                               i++;
00386                               (*psArray2)[ *pusArraySize2 ] = (*psArray1)[ i ];
00387                               (*pusMiddleIndex2)++;
00388                               (*pusArraySize2)++;
00389                               (*psArray1)[ i ] = -1;
00390                         }
00391                         break;
00392                   }
00393             }
00394       }
00395       if( us2ndBenchmarkID != 0xffff )
00396       {
00397             for( i = us2ndBenchmarkID; i > *pusMiddleIndex1; i-- )
00398             {
00399                   if( !EdgepointsClose( pSoldier, (*psArray1)[ i ], (*psArray1)[ i-1 ] ) )
00400                   { //All edgepoints from 1st middle index  to i-1 are rejected.
00401                         while( i > *pusMiddleIndex1 )
00402                         {
00403                               i--;
00404                               (*psArray2)[ *pusArraySize2 ] = (*psArray1)[ i ];
00405                               (*pusArraySize2)++;
00406                               (*psArray1)[ i ] = -1;
00407                         }
00408                         break;
00409                   }
00410             }
00411             for( i = us2ndBenchmarkID; i < *pusArraySize1 - 1; i++ )
00412             {
00413                   if( !EdgepointsClose( pSoldier, (*psArray1)[ i ], (*psArray1)[ i+1 ] ) )
00414                   { //All edgepoints from index 0 to i-1 are rejected.
00415                         while( i < *pusArraySize1 - 1 )
00416                         {
00417                               i++;
00418                               (*psArray2)[ (*pusArraySize2) ] = (*psArray1)[ i ];
00419                               (*pusArraySize2)++;
00420                               (*psArray1)[ i ] = -1;
00421                         }
00422                         break;
00423                   }
00424             }
00425       }
00426       //Now compact the primary array, because some edgepoints have been removed.
00427       CompactEdgepointArray( psArray1, pusMiddleIndex1, pusArraySize1 );
00428       (*psArray2) = (INT16*)MemRealloc( (*psArray2), *pusArraySize2 * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00429 }
00430 
00431 void ClassifyEdgepoints()
00432 {
00433       SOLDIERTYPE Soldier;
00434       INT16 sGridNo = -1;
00435 
00436       memset( &Soldier, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
00437       Soldier.bTeam = 1;
00438 
00439       //north
00440       if( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo != -1 )
00441       {
00442             sGridNo = FindNearestEdgepointOnSpecifiedEdge( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo, NORTH_EDGEPOINT_SEARCH );
00443             if( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
00444             { 
00445                   InternallyClassifyEdgepoints( &Soldier, sGridNo, 
00446                         &gps1stNorthEdgepointArray, &gus1stNorthEdgepointMiddleIndex, &gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize,
00447                         &gps2ndNorthEdgepointArray, &gus2ndNorthEdgepointMiddleIndex, &gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize );
00448             }
00449       }
00450       //east
00451       if( gMapInformation.sEastGridNo != -1 )
00452       {
00453             sGridNo = FindNearestEdgepointOnSpecifiedEdge( gMapInformation.sEastGridNo, EAST_EDGEPOINT_SEARCH );
00454             if( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
00455             { 
00456                   InternallyClassifyEdgepoints( &Soldier, sGridNo, 
00457                         &gps1stEastEdgepointArray, &gus1stEastEdgepointMiddleIndex, &gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize,
00458                         &gps2ndEastEdgepointArray, &gus2ndEastEdgepointMiddleIndex, &gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize );
00459             }
00460       }
00461       //south
00462       if( gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo != -1 )
00463       {
00464             sGridNo = FindNearestEdgepointOnSpecifiedEdge( gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo, SOUTH_EDGEPOINT_SEARCH );
00465             if( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
00466             { 
00467                   InternallyClassifyEdgepoints( &Soldier, sGridNo, 
00468                         &gps1stSouthEdgepointArray, &gus1stSouthEdgepointMiddleIndex, &gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize,
00469                         &gps2ndSouthEdgepointArray, &gus2ndSouthEdgepointMiddleIndex, &gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize );
00470             }
00471       }
00472       //west
00473       if( gMapInformation.sWestGridNo != -1 )
00474       {
00475             sGridNo = FindNearestEdgepointOnSpecifiedEdge( gMapInformation.sWestGridNo, WEST_EDGEPOINT_SEARCH );
00476             if( sGridNo != NOWHERE )
00477             { 
00478                   InternallyClassifyEdgepoints( &Soldier, sGridNo, 
00479                         &gps1stWestEdgepointArray, &gus1stWestEdgepointMiddleIndex, &gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize,
00480                         &gps2ndWestEdgepointArray, &gus2ndWestEdgepointMiddleIndex, &gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize );
00481             }
00482       }
00483 }
00484 
00485 void GenerateMapEdgepoints()
00486 {
00487       INT32 i=-1;
00488       INT16 sGridNo=-1;
00489       INT16 sVGridNo[400];
00490       UINT8 gubSaveNPCAPBudget=0;
00491       UINT8 gubSaveNPCDistLimit=0;
00492 
00493       //Get rid of the current edgepoint lists.
00494       TrashMapEdgepoints();
00495 
00496       gfGeneratingMapEdgepoints = TRUE;
00497 
00498       if( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo    != -1 )
00499             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo;
00500       else if( gMapInformation.sEastGridNo      != -1 )
00501             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sEastGridNo;
00502       else if( gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo     != -1 )
00503             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo;
00504       else if( gMapInformation.sWestGridNo != -1 )
00505             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sWestGridNo;
00506       else if( gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo != -1 )
00507             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo;
00508       else
00509             return;
00510 
00511       GlobalReachableTest( sGridNo );
00512 
00513       //Calculate the north edges
00514       if( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo != -1 )
00515       {
00516             //1st row
00517             sGridNo = gsTLGridNo;
00518             if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00519                    (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00520                   sVGridNo[ gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00521             while( sGridNo > gsTRGridNo )
00522             {
00523                   sGridNo++;
00524                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00525                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00526                         sVGridNo[ gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00527                   sGridNo -= 160;
00528                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00529                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00530                         sVGridNo[ gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00531             }
00532             //2nd row
00533             gus1stNorthEdgepointMiddleIndex = gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize;
00534             sGridNo = gsTLGridNo + 161;
00535             if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00536                    (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00537                   sVGridNo[ gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00538             while( sGridNo > gsTRGridNo + 161 )
00539             {
00540                   sGridNo++;
00541                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00542                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00543                         sVGridNo[ gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00544                   sGridNo -= 160;
00545                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00546                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00547                         sVGridNo[ gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00548             }
00549             if( gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize )
00550             { 
00551                   //Allocate and copy over the valid gridnos.
00552                   gps1stNorthEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16) );
00553                   for( i = 0; i < gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
00554                         gps1stNorthEdgepointArray[ i ] = sVGridNo[ i ];
00555             }
00556       }
00557       //Calculate the east edges
00558       if( gMapInformation.sEastGridNo != -1 )
00559       {
00560             //1st row
00561             sGridNo = gsTRGridNo;
00562             if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00563                    (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00564                   sVGridNo[ gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00565             while( sGridNo < gsBRGridNo )
00566             {
00567                   sGridNo += 160;
00568                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00569                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00570                         sVGridNo[ gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00571                   sGridNo++;
00572                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00573                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00574                         sVGridNo[ gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00575             }
00576             //2nd row
00577             gus1stEastEdgepointMiddleIndex = gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize;
00578             sGridNo = gsTRGridNo + 159;
00579             if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00580                    (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00581                   sVGridNo[ gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00582             while( sGridNo < gsBRGridNo + 159 )
00583             {
00584                   sGridNo += 160;
00585                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00586                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00587                         sVGridNo[ gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00588                   sGridNo++;
00589                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00590                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00591                         sVGridNo[ gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00592             }
00593             if( gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize )
00594             { //Allocate and copy over the valid gridnos.
00595                   gps1stEastEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16) );
00596                   for( i = 0; i < gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
00597                         gps1stEastEdgepointArray[ i ] = sVGridNo[ i ];
00598             }
00599       }
00600       //Calculate the south edges
00601       if( gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo != -1 )
00602       {
00603             //1st row
00604             sGridNo = gsBLGridNo;
00605             if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00606                    (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00607                   sVGridNo[ gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00608             while( sGridNo > gsBRGridNo )
00609             {
00610                   sGridNo++;
00611                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00612                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00613                         sVGridNo[ gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00614                   sGridNo -= 160;
00615                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00616                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00617                         sVGridNo[ gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00618             }
00619             //2nd row
00620             gus1stSouthEdgepointMiddleIndex = gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize;
00621             sGridNo = gsBLGridNo - 161;
00622             if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00623                    (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00624                   sVGridNo[ gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00625             while( sGridNo > gsBRGridNo - 161 )
00626             {
00627                   sGridNo++;
00628                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00629                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00630                         sVGridNo[ gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00631                   sGridNo -= 160;
00632                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00633                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00634                         sVGridNo[ gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00635             }
00636             if( gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize )
00637             { //Allocate and copy over the valid gridnos.
00638                   gps1stSouthEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16) );
00639                   for( i = 0; i < gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
00640                         gps1stSouthEdgepointArray[ i ] = sVGridNo[ i ];
00641             }
00642       }
00643       //Calculate the west edges
00644       if( gMapInformation.sWestGridNo != -1 )
00645       {
00646             //1st row
00647             sGridNo = gsTLGridNo;
00648             if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00649                    (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00650                   sVGridNo[ gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00651             while( sGridNo < gsBLGridNo )
00652             {
00653                   sGridNo++;
00654                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00655                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00656                         sVGridNo[ gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00657                   sGridNo += 160;
00658                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00659                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00660                         sVGridNo[ gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00661             }
00662             //2nd row
00663             gus1stWestEdgepointMiddleIndex = gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize;
00664             sGridNo = gsTLGridNo - 159;
00665             if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00666                    (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00667                   sVGridNo[ gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00668             while( sGridNo < gsBLGridNo - 159 )
00669             {
00670                   sGridNo++;
00671                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00672                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00673                         sVGridNo[ gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00674                   sGridNo += 160;
00675                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00676                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00677                         sVGridNo[ gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00678             }
00679             if( gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize )
00680             { //Allocate and copy over the valid gridnos.
00681                   gps1stWestEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16) );
00682                   for( i = 0; i < gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
00683                         gps1stWestEdgepointArray[ i ] = sVGridNo[ i ];
00684             }
00685       }
00686 
00687       //CHECK FOR ISOLATED EDGEPOINTS (but only if the entrypoint is ISOLATED!!!)
00688       if( gMapInformation.sIsolatedGridNo != -1 && !(gpWorldLevelData[ gMapInformation.sIsolatedGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE) )
00689       {
00690             GlobalReachableTest( gMapInformation.sIsolatedGridNo );
00691             if( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo != -1 )
00692             {
00693                   //1st row
00694                   sGridNo = gsTLGridNo;
00695                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00696                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00697                         sVGridNo[ gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00698                   while( sGridNo > gsTRGridNo )
00699                   {
00700                         sGridNo++;
00701                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00702                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00703                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00704                         sGridNo -= 160;
00705                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00706                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00707                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00708                   }
00709                   //2nd row
00710                   gus2ndNorthEdgepointMiddleIndex = gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize;
00711                   sGridNo = gsTLGridNo + 161;
00712                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00713                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00714                         sVGridNo[ gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00715                   while( sGridNo > gsTRGridNo + 161 )
00716                   {
00717                         sGridNo++;
00718                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00719                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00720                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00721                         sGridNo -= 160;
00722                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00723                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00724                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00725                   }
00726                   if( gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize )
00727                   { 
00728                         //Allocate and copy over the valid gridnos.
00729                         gps2ndNorthEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16) );
00730                         for( i = 0; i < gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
00731                               gps2ndNorthEdgepointArray[ i ] = sVGridNo[ i ];
00732                   }
00733             }
00734             //Calculate the east edges
00735             if( gMapInformation.sEastGridNo != -1 )
00736             {
00737                   //1st row
00738                   sGridNo = gsTRGridNo;
00739                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00740                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00741                         sVGridNo[ gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00742                   while( sGridNo < gsBRGridNo )
00743                   {
00744                         sGridNo += 160;
00745                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00746                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00747                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00748                         sGridNo++;
00749                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00750                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00751                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00752                   }
00753                   //2nd row
00754                   gus2ndEastEdgepointMiddleIndex = gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize;
00755                   sGridNo = gsTRGridNo + 159;
00756                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00757                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00758                         sVGridNo[ gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00759                   while( sGridNo < gsBRGridNo + 159 )
00760                   {
00761                         sGridNo += 160;
00762                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00763                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00764                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00765                         sGridNo++;
00766                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00767                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00768                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00769                   }
00770                   if( gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize )
00771                   { //Allocate and copy over the valid gridnos.
00772                         gps2ndEastEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16) );
00773                         for( i = 0; i < gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
00774                               gps2ndEastEdgepointArray[ i ] = sVGridNo[ i ];
00775                   }
00776             }
00777             //Calculate the south edges
00778             if( gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo != -1 )
00779             {
00780                   //1st row
00781                   sGridNo = gsBLGridNo;
00782                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00783                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00784                         sVGridNo[ gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00785                   while( sGridNo > gsBRGridNo )
00786                   {
00787                         sGridNo++;
00788                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00789                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00790                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00791                         sGridNo -= 160;
00792                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00793                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00794                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00795                   }
00796                   //2nd row
00797                   gus2ndSouthEdgepointMiddleIndex = gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize;
00798                   sGridNo = gsBLGridNo - 161;
00799                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00800                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00801                         sVGridNo[ gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00802                   while( sGridNo > gsBRGridNo - 161 )
00803                   {
00804                         sGridNo++;
00805                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00806                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00807                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00808                         sGridNo -= 160;
00809                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00810                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00811                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00812                   }
00813                   if( gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize )
00814                   { //Allocate and copy over the valid gridnos.
00815                         gps2ndSouthEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16) );
00816                         for( i = 0; i < gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
00817                               gps2ndSouthEdgepointArray[ i ] = sVGridNo[ i ];
00818                   }
00819             }
00820             //Calculate the west edges
00821             if( gMapInformation.sWestGridNo != -1 )
00822             {
00823                   //1st row
00824                   sGridNo = gsTLGridNo;
00825                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00826                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00827                         sVGridNo[ gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00828                   while( sGridNo < gsBLGridNo )
00829                   {
00830                         sGridNo++;
00831                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00832                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00833                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00834                         sGridNo += 160;
00835                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00836                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00837                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00838                   }
00839                   //2nd row
00840                   gus2ndWestEdgepointMiddleIndex = gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize;
00841                   sGridNo = gsTLGridNo - 159;
00842                   if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00843                          (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00844                         sVGridNo[ gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00845                   while( sGridNo < gsBLGridNo - 159 )
00846                   {
00847                         sGridNo++;
00848                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00849                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00850                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00851                         sGridNo += 160;
00852                         if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE && 
00853                                (!gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] || gfBasement) )
00854                               sVGridNo[ gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize++ ] = sGridNo;
00855                   }
00856                   if( gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize )
00857                   { //Allocate and copy over the valid gridnos.
00858                         gps2ndWestEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16) );
00859                         for( i = 0; i < gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
00860                               gps2ndWestEdgepointArray[ i ] = sVGridNo[ i ];
00861                   }
00862             }
00863       }
00864       
00865       //Eliminates any edgepoints not accessible to the edge of the world.  This is done to the primary edgepoints
00866       ValidateEdgepoints();
00867       //Second step is to process the primary edgepoints and determine if any of the edgepoints aren't accessible from
00868       //the associated entrypoint.  These edgepoints that are rejected are placed in the secondary list.
00869       if( gMapInformation.sIsolatedGridNo != -1 )
00870       { //only if there is an isolated gridno in the map.  There is a flaw in the design of this system.  The classification
00871             //process will automatically assign areas to be isolated if there is an obstacle between one normal edgepoint and another
00872             //causing a 5 tile connection check to fail.  So, all maps with isolated edgepoints will need to be checked manually to
00873             //make sure there are no obstacles causing this to happen (except for obstacles between normal areas and the isolated area)
00874 
00875             //Good thing most maps don't have isolated sections.  This is one expensive function to call!  Maybe 200MI!
00876             ClassifyEdgepoints();
00877       }
00878 
00879       gfGeneratingMapEdgepoints = FALSE;
00880 }
00881 
00882 void SaveMapEdgepoints( HWFILE fp )
00883 {
00884       //1st priority edgepoints -- for common entry -- tactical placement gui uses only these points.
00885       FileWrite( fp, &gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize, 2, NULL );
00886       FileWrite( fp, &gus1stNorthEdgepointMiddleIndex, 2, NULL );
00887       if( gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize )
00888             FileWrite( fp, gps1stNorthEdgepointArray, gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ), NULL );
00889       FileWrite( fp, &gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize, 2, NULL );
00890       FileWrite( fp, &gus1stEastEdgepointMiddleIndex, 2, NULL );
00891       if( gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize )
00892             FileWrite( fp, gps1stEastEdgepointArray, gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ), NULL );
00893       FileWrite( fp, &gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize, 2, NULL );
00894       FileWrite( fp, &gus1stSouthEdgepointMiddleIndex, 2, NULL );
00895       if( gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize )
00896             FileWrite( fp, gps1stSouthEdgepointArray, gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ), NULL );
00897       FileWrite( fp, &gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize, 2, NULL );
00898       FileWrite( fp, &gus1stWestEdgepointMiddleIndex, 2, NULL );
00899       if( gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize )
00900             FileWrite( fp, gps1stWestEdgepointArray, gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ), NULL );
00901       //2nd priority edgepoints -- for isolated areas.  Okay to be zero
00902       FileWrite( fp, &gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize, 2, NULL );
00903       FileWrite( fp, &gus2ndNorthEdgepointMiddleIndex, 2, NULL );
00904       if( gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize )
00905             FileWrite( fp, gps2ndNorthEdgepointArray, gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ), NULL );
00906       FileWrite( fp, &gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize, 2, NULL );
00907       FileWrite( fp, &gus2ndEastEdgepointMiddleIndex, 2, NULL );
00908       if( gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize )
00909             FileWrite( fp, gps2ndEastEdgepointArray, gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ), NULL );
00910       FileWrite( fp, &gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize, 2, NULL );
00911       FileWrite( fp, &gus2ndSouthEdgepointMiddleIndex, 2, NULL );
00912       if( gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize )
00913             FileWrite( fp, gps2ndSouthEdgepointArray, gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ), NULL );
00914       FileWrite( fp, &gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize, 2, NULL );
00915       FileWrite( fp, &gus2ndWestEdgepointMiddleIndex, 2, NULL );
00916       if( gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize )
00917             FileWrite( fp, gps2ndWestEdgepointArray, gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ), NULL );
00918 }
00919 
00920 void OldLoadMapEdgepoints( INT8 **hBuffer )
00921 {
00922       LOADDATA( &gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize, *hBuffer, 2 );
00923       LOADDATA( &gus1stNorthEdgepointMiddleIndex, *hBuffer, 2 );
00924       if( gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize )
00925       {
00926             gps1stNorthEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00927             Assert( gps1stNorthEdgepointArray );
00928             LOADDATA( gps1stNorthEdgepointArray, *hBuffer, gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00929       }
00930       LOADDATA( &gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize, *hBuffer, 2 );
00931       LOADDATA( &gus1stEastEdgepointMiddleIndex, *hBuffer, 2 );
00932       if( gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize )
00933       {
00934             gps1stEastEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00935             Assert( gps1stEastEdgepointArray );
00936             LOADDATA( gps1stEastEdgepointArray, *hBuffer, gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00937       }
00938       LOADDATA( &gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize, *hBuffer, 2 );
00939       LOADDATA( &gus1stSouthEdgepointMiddleIndex, *hBuffer, 2 );
00940       if( gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize )
00941       {
00942             gps1stSouthEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00943             Assert( gps1stSouthEdgepointArray );
00944             LOADDATA( gps1stSouthEdgepointArray, *hBuffer, gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00945       }
00946       LOADDATA( &gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize, *hBuffer, 2 );
00947       LOADDATA( &gus1stWestEdgepointMiddleIndex, *hBuffer, 2 );
00948       if( gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize )
00949       {
00950             gps1stWestEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00951             Assert( gps1stWestEdgepointArray );
00952             LOADDATA( gps1stWestEdgepointArray, *hBuffer, gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00953       }
00954 }
00955 
00956 BOOLEAN LoadMapEdgepoints( INT8 **hBuffer )
00957 {
00958       TrashMapEdgepoints();
00959       if( gMapInformation.ubMapVersion < 17 )
00960       {     //To prevent invalidation of older maps, which only used one layer of edgepoints, and a UINT8 for 
00961             //containing the size, we will preserve that paradigm, then kill the loaded edgepoints and 
00962             //regenerate them.
00963             OldLoadMapEdgepoints( hBuffer );
00964             TrashMapEdgepoints();
00965             return FALSE;
00966       }
00967       LOADDATA( &gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize, *hBuffer, 2 );
00968       LOADDATA( &gus1stNorthEdgepointMiddleIndex, *hBuffer, 2 );
00969       if( gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize )
00970       {
00971             gps1stNorthEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00972             Assert( gps1stNorthEdgepointArray );
00973             LOADDATA( gps1stNorthEdgepointArray, *hBuffer, gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00974       }
00975       LOADDATA( &gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize, *hBuffer, 2 );
00976       LOADDATA( &gus1stEastEdgepointMiddleIndex, *hBuffer, 2 );
00977       if( gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize )
00978       {
00979             gps1stEastEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00980             Assert( gps1stEastEdgepointArray );
00981             LOADDATA( gps1stEastEdgepointArray, *hBuffer, gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00982       }
00983       LOADDATA( &gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize, *hBuffer, 2 );
00984       LOADDATA( &gus1stSouthEdgepointMiddleIndex, *hBuffer, 2 );
00985       if( gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize )
00986       {
00987             gps1stSouthEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00988             Assert( gps1stSouthEdgepointArray );
00989             LOADDATA( gps1stSouthEdgepointArray, *hBuffer, gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00990       }
00991       LOADDATA( &gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize, *hBuffer, 2 );
00992       LOADDATA( &gus1stWestEdgepointMiddleIndex, *hBuffer, 2 );
00993       if( gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize )
00994       {
00995             gps1stWestEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00996             Assert( gps1stWestEdgepointArray );
00997             LOADDATA( gps1stWestEdgepointArray, *hBuffer, gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
00998       }
00999 
01000       LOADDATA( &gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize, *hBuffer, 2 );
01001       LOADDATA( &gus2ndNorthEdgepointMiddleIndex, *hBuffer, 2 );
01002       if( gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize )
01003       {
01004             gps2ndNorthEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
01005             Assert( gps2ndNorthEdgepointArray );
01006             LOADDATA( gps2ndNorthEdgepointArray, *hBuffer, gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
01007       }
01008       LOADDATA( &gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize, *hBuffer, 2 );
01009       LOADDATA( &gus2ndEastEdgepointMiddleIndex, *hBuffer, 2 );
01010       if( gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize )
01011       {
01012             gps2ndEastEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
01013             Assert( gps2ndEastEdgepointArray );
01014             LOADDATA( gps2ndEastEdgepointArray, *hBuffer, gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
01015       }
01016       LOADDATA( &gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize, *hBuffer, 2 );
01017       LOADDATA( &gus2ndSouthEdgepointMiddleIndex, *hBuffer, 2 );
01018       if( gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize )
01019       {
01020             gps2ndSouthEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
01021             Assert( gps2ndSouthEdgepointArray );
01022             LOADDATA( gps2ndSouthEdgepointArray, *hBuffer, gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
01023       }
01024       LOADDATA( &gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize, *hBuffer, 2 );
01025       LOADDATA( &gus2ndWestEdgepointMiddleIndex, *hBuffer, 2 );
01026       if( gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize )
01027       {
01028             gps2ndWestEdgepointArray = (INT16*)MemAlloc( gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
01029             Assert( gps2ndWestEdgepointArray );
01030             LOADDATA( gps2ndWestEdgepointArray, *hBuffer, gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize * sizeof( INT16 ) );
01031       }
01032       if( gMapInformation.ubMapVersion < 22 )
01033       {     //regenerate them.
01034             TrashMapEdgepoints();
01035             return FALSE;
01036       }
01037 
01038       return TRUE;
01039 }
01040 
01041 UINT16 ChooseMapEdgepoint( UINT8 ubStrategicInsertionCode )
01042 {
01043       INT16 *psArray=NULL;
01044       UINT16 usArraySize=0;
01045       static INT32 randomVal=0;
01046 
01047       //First validate and get access to the correct array based on strategic direction.
01048       //We will use the selected array to choose insertion gridno's.
01049       switch( ubStrategicInsertionCode )
01050       {
01051             case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:
01052                   psArray = gps1stNorthEdgepointArray;
01053                   usArraySize = gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize;
01054                   break;
01055             case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:
01056                   psArray = gps1stEastEdgepointArray;
01057                   usArraySize = gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize;
01058                   break;
01059             case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:
01060                   psArray = gps1stSouthEdgepointArray;
01061                   usArraySize = gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize;
01062                   break;
01063             case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:
01064                   psArray = gps1stWestEdgepointArray;
01065                   usArraySize = gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize;
01066                   break;
01067             default:
01068                   AssertMsg( 0, "ChooseMapEdgepoints:  Failed to pass a valid strategic insertion code." );
01069                   break;
01070       }
01071       if( !usArraySize )
01072       {
01073             return NOWHERE;
01074       }
01075       return psArray[ Random( usArraySize ) ];
01076 }
01077 
01078 void ChooseMapEdgepoints( MAPEDGEPOINTINFO *pMapEdgepointInfo, UINT8 ubStrategicInsertionCode, UINT8 ubNumDesiredPoints )
01079 {
01080       INT16 *psArray=NULL;
01081       UINT16 usArraySize=0;
01082       INT32 i=-1;
01083       UINT16 usSlots, usCurrSlot;
01084       INT16 *psTempArray = NULL;
01085 
01086       AssertMsg( ubNumDesiredPoints > 0  && ubNumDesiredPoints <= 32,
01087             String( "ChooseMapEdgepoints:  Desired points = %d, valid range is 1-32", ubNumDesiredPoints ) );
01088       //First validate and get access to the correct array based on strategic direction.
01089       //We will use the selected array to choose insertion gridno's.
01090       switch( ubStrategicInsertionCode )
01091       {
01092             case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:
01093                   psArray = gps1stNorthEdgepointArray;
01094                   usArraySize = gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize;
01095                   break;
01096             case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:
01097                   psArray = gps1stEastEdgepointArray;
01098                   usArraySize = gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize;
01099                   break;
01100             case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:
01101                   psArray = gps1stSouthEdgepointArray;
01102                   usArraySize = gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize;
01103                   break;
01104             case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:
01105                   psArray = gps1stWestEdgepointArray;
01106                   usArraySize = gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize;
01107                   break;
01108             default:
01109                   AssertMsg( 0, "ChooseMapEdgepoints:  Failed to pass a valid strategic insertion code." );
01110                   break;
01111       }
01112       pMapEdgepointInfo->ubStrategicInsertionCode = ubStrategicInsertionCode;
01113       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01114             if( !psArray || !usArraySize )
01115             {
01116                   if( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo == -1 && gMapInformation.sEastGridNo == -1 &&
01117                           gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo == -1 && gMapInformation.sWestGridNo == -1 &&
01118                               gMapInformation.sCenterGridNo == -1 )
01119                   {
01120                         if( gbWorldSectorZ )
01121                         {
01122                               AssertMsg( 0, 
01123                                     String( "Map %c%d_b%d(_a) doesn't have ANY entry points which means that it is impossible to generate map edgepoints. (LC : 1)",
01124                                     gWorldSectorY + 'A' - 1, gWorldSectorX, gbWorldSectorZ ) );
01125                         }
01126                         else
01127                         {
01128                               AssertMsg( 0, 
01129                                     String( "Map %c%d(_a) doesn't have ANY entry points which means that it is impossible to generate map edgepoints. (LC : 1)",
01130                                     gWorldSectorY + 'A' - 1, gWorldSectorX ) );
01131                         }
01132                   }
01133                   else switch( ubStrategicInsertionCode )
01134                   {
01135                         case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:
01136                               AssertMsg( 0, "This map doesn't have any north mapedgepoints.  Possibly because there is no north entry point. (LC : 1)" );
01137                               break;
01138                         case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:
01139                               AssertMsg( 0, "This map doesn't have any east mapedgepoints.  Possibly because there is no east entry point. (LC : 1)" );
01140                               break;
01141                         case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:
01142                               AssertMsg( 0, "This map doesn't have any south mapedgepoints.  Possibly because there is no south entry point. (LC : 1)" );
01143                               break;
01144                         case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:
01145                               AssertMsg( 0, "This map doesn't have any west mapedgepoints.  Possibly because there is no west entry point.  NOTE:  Teleportation always uses the west entrypoint.  Some maps shouldn't have west entrypoints. (LC : 1)" );
01146                               break;
01147                   }
01148             }
01149       #endif
01150       if( !usArraySize )
01151       {
01152             pMapEdgepointInfo->ubNumPoints = 0;
01153             return;
01154       }
01155 
01156       // JA2 Gold: don't place people in the water.
01157       // If any of the waypoints is on a water spot, we're going to have to remove it
01158       psTempArray = (INT16 *) MemAlloc( sizeof(INT16) * usArraySize );
01159       memcpy(psTempArray, psArray, sizeof(INT16) * usArraySize );
01160       psArray = psTempArray;
01161       for (i = 0; i < usArraySize; i++)
01162       {
01163             if (GetTerrainType(psArray[ i ]) == MED_WATER || GetTerrainType(psArray[ i ]) == DEEP_WATER)
01164             {
01165                   if (i == usArraySize - 1)
01166                   {
01167                         // just axe it and we're done.
01168                         psArray[ i ] = 0;
01169                         usArraySize--;
01170                         break;
01171                   }
01172                   else
01173                   {
01174                         // replace this element in the array with the LAST element in the array, then decrement
01175                         // the array size
01176                         psArray[ i ] = psArray[usArraySize-1];
01177                         usArraySize--;
01178                         // we're going to have to check the array element we just copied into this spot, too
01179                         i--;
01180                   }
01181             }
01182       }
01183 
01184       if( ubNumDesiredPoints >= usArraySize )
01185       { //We don't have enough points for everyone, return them all.
01186             pMapEdgepointInfo->ubNumPoints = (UINT8)usArraySize;
01187             for( i = 0; i < usArraySize; i++ )
01188                   pMapEdgepointInfo->sGridNo[i] = psArray[i];
01189 
01190             // JA2Gold: free the temp array
01191             MemFree(psTempArray);
01192             return;
01193       }
01194       //We have more points, so choose them randomly.
01195       usSlots = usArraySize;
01196       usCurrSlot = 0;
01197       pMapEdgepointInfo->ubNumPoints = ubNumDesiredPoints;
01198       for( i = 0; i < usArraySize; i++ )
01199       {
01200             if( Random( usSlots ) < ubNumDesiredPoints )
01201             {
01202                   pMapEdgepointInfo->sGridNo[ usCurrSlot++ ] = psArray[ i ];
01203                   ubNumDesiredPoints--;
01204             }
01205             usSlots--;
01206       }
01207 
01208       // JA2Gold: free the temp array
01209       MemFree(psTempArray);
01210 
01211 }
01212 
01213 INT16 *gpReservedGridNos = NULL;
01214 INT16 gsReservedIndex   = 0;
01215 
01216 void BeginMapEdgepointSearch()
01217 {
01218       INT16 sGridNo;
01219 
01220       //Create the reserved list
01221       AssertMsg( !gpReservedGridNos, "Attempting to BeginMapEdgepointSearch that has already been created." );
01222       gpReservedGridNos = (INT16*)MemAlloc( 20 * sizeof( INT16 ) );
01223       Assert( gpReservedGridNos );
01224       gsReservedIndex = 0;
01225 
01226       if( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo != -1 )
01227             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo;
01228       else if( gMapInformation.sEastGridNo != -1 )
01229             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sEastGridNo;
01230       else if( gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo != -1 )
01231             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo;
01232       else if( gMapInformation.sWestGridNo != -1 )
01233             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sWestGridNo;
01234       else 
01235             return;
01236 
01237       GlobalReachableTest( sGridNo );
01238 
01239       //Now, we have the path values calculated.  Now, we can check for closest edgepoints.
01240 }
01241 
01242 void EndMapEdgepointSearch()
01243 {
01244       AssertMsg( gpReservedGridNos, "Attempting to EndMapEdgepointSearch that has already been removed." );
01245       MemFree( gpReservedGridNos );
01246       gpReservedGridNos = NULL;
01247       gsReservedIndex = 0;
01248 }
01249 
01250 
01251 //THIS CODE ISN'T RECOMMENDED FOR TIME CRITICAL AREAS.
01252 INT16 SearchForClosestPrimaryMapEdgepoint( INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubInsertionCode )
01253 {
01254       INT32 i, iDirectionLoop;
01255       INT16 *psArray=NULL;
01256       INT16 sRadius, sDistance, sDirection, sOriginalGridNo;
01257       UINT16 usArraySize=0;
01258       BOOLEAN fReserved;
01259 
01260       if( gsReservedIndex >= 20 )
01261       { //Everything is reserved.  
01262             AssertMsg( 0, "All closest map edgepoints have been reserved.  We should only have 20 soldiers maximum...");
01263       }
01264       switch( ubInsertionCode )
01265       {
01266             case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:
01267                   psArray = gps1stNorthEdgepointArray;
01268                   usArraySize = gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize;
01269                   if( !usArraySize )
01270                         AssertMsg( 0, String( "Sector %c%d level %d doesn't have any north mapedgepoints. LC:1", 
01271                                                        gWorldSectorY + 'A' - 1, gWorldSectorX, gbWorldSectorZ ) );
01272                   break;
01273             case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:
01274                   psArray = gps1stEastEdgepointArray;
01275                   usArraySize = gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize;
01276                   if( !usArraySize )
01277                         AssertMsg( 0, String( "Sector %c%d level %d doesn't have any east mapedgepoints. LC:1", 
01278                                                        gWorldSectorY + 'A' - 1, gWorldSectorX, gbWorldSectorZ ) );
01279                   break;
01280             case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:
01281                   psArray = gps1stSouthEdgepointArray;
01282                   usArraySize = gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize;
01283                   if( !usArraySize )
01284                         AssertMsg( 0, String( "Sector %c%d level %d doesn't have any south mapedgepoints. LC:1", 
01285                                                        gWorldSectorY + 'A' - 1, gWorldSectorX, gbWorldSectorZ ) );
01286                   break;
01287             case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:
01288                   psArray = gps1stWestEdgepointArray;
01289                   usArraySize = gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize;
01290                   if( !usArraySize )
01291                         AssertMsg( 0, String( "Sector %c%d level %d doesn't have any west mapedgepoints. LC:1", 
01292                                                        gWorldSectorY + 'A' - 1, gWorldSectorX, gbWorldSectorZ ) );
01293                   break;
01294       }
01295       if( !usArraySize )
01296       {
01297             return NOWHERE;
01298       }
01299 
01300       //Check the initial gridno, to see if it is available and an edgepoint.
01301       fReserved = FALSE;
01302       for( i = 0; i < gsReservedIndex; i++ )
01303       {
01304             if( gpReservedGridNos[ i ] == sGridNo )
01305             {
01306                   fReserved = TRUE;
01307                   break;
01308             }
01309       }
01310       if( !fReserved )
01311       {     //Not reserved, so see if we can find this gridno in the edgepoint array.
01312             for( i = 0 ; i < usArraySize; i++ )
01313             {
01314                   if( psArray[ i ] == sGridNo )
01315                   { //Yes, the gridno is in the edgepoint array.
01316                         gpReservedGridNos[ gsReservedIndex ] = sGridNo;
01317                         gsReservedIndex++;
01318                         return sGridNo;
01319                   }
01320             }
01321       }
01322 
01323       //spiral outwards, until we find an unreserved mapedgepoint.
01324       //
01325       // 09 08 07 06
01326       // 10 01 00 05
01327       // 11 02 03 04
01328       // 12 13 14 15 ..
01329       sRadius = 1;
01330       sDirection = WORLD_COLS;
01331       sOriginalGridNo = sGridNo;
01332       while( sRadius < (INT16)(gbWorldSectorZ ? 30 : 10) )
01333       {
01334             sGridNo = sOriginalGridNo + (-1 - WORLD_COLS)*sRadius; //start at the TOP-LEFT gridno
01335             for( iDirectionLoop = 0; iDirectionLoop < 4; iDirectionLoop++ )
01336             {
01337                   switch( iDirectionLoop )
01338                   {
01339                         case 0:     sDirection = WORLD_COLS;      break;
01340                         case 1:     sDirection = 1;                                 break;
01341                         case 2:     sDirection = -WORLD_COLS;     break;
01342                         case 3:     sDirection = -1;                          break;
01343                   }
01344                   sDistance = sRadius * 2;
01345                   while( sDistance-- )
01346                   {
01347                         sGridNo += sDirection;
01348                         if( sGridNo < 0 || sGridNo >= WORLD_MAX )
01349                               continue; 
01350                         //Check the gridno, to see if it is available and an edgepoint.
01351                         fReserved = FALSE;
01352                         for( i = 0; i < gsReservedIndex; i++ )
01353                         {
01354                               if( gpReservedGridNos[ i ] == sGridNo )
01355                               {
01356                                     fReserved = TRUE;
01357                                     break;
01358                               }
01359                         }
01360                         if( !fReserved )
01361                         {     //Not reserved, so see if we can find this gridno in the edgepoint array.
01362                               for( i = 0 ; i < usArraySize; i++ )
01363                               {
01364                                     if( psArray[ i ] == sGridNo )
01365                                     { //Yes, the gridno is in the edgepoint array.
01366                                           gpReservedGridNos[ gsReservedIndex ] = sGridNo;
01367                                           gsReservedIndex++;
01368                                           return sGridNo;
01369                                     }
01370                               }
01371                         }
01372                   }
01373             }
01374             sRadius++;
01375       }
01376       return NOWHERE ;
01377 }
01378 
01379 INT16 SearchForClosestSecondaryMapEdgepoint( INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubInsertionCode )
01380 {
01381       INT32 i, iDirectionLoop;
01382       INT16 *psArray=NULL;
01383       INT16 sRadius, sDistance, sDirection, sOriginalGridNo;
01384       UINT16 usArraySize=0;
01385       BOOLEAN fReserved;
01386 
01387       if( gsReservedIndex >= 20 )
01388       { //Everything is reserved.  
01389             AssertMsg( 0, "All closest map edgepoints have been reserved.  We should only have 20 soldiers maximum...");
01390       }
01391       switch( ubInsertionCode )
01392       {
01393             case INSERTION_CODE_NORTH:
01394                   psArray = gps2ndNorthEdgepointArray;
01395                   usArraySize = gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize;
01396                   if( !usArraySize )
01397                         AssertMsg( 0, String( "Sector %c%d level %d doesn't have any isolated north mapedgepoints. KM:1", 
01398                                                        gWorldSectorY + 'A' - 1, gWorldSectorX, gbWorldSectorZ ) );
01399                   break;
01400             case INSERTION_CODE_EAST:
01401                   psArray = gps2ndEastEdgepointArray;
01402                   usArraySize = gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize;
01403                   if( !usArraySize )
01404                         AssertMsg( 0, String( "Sector %c%d level %d doesn't have any isolated east mapedgepoints. KM:1", 
01405                                                        gWorldSectorY + 'A' - 1, gWorldSectorX, gbWorldSectorZ ) );
01406                   break;
01407             case INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH:
01408                   psArray = gps2ndSouthEdgepointArray;
01409                   usArraySize = gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize;
01410                   if( !usArraySize )
01411                         AssertMsg( 0, String( "Sector %c%d level %d doesn't have any isolated south mapedgepoints. KM:1", 
01412                                                        gWorldSectorY + 'A' - 1, gWorldSectorX, gbWorldSectorZ ) );
01413                   break;
01414             case INSERTION_CODE_WEST:
01415                   psArray = gps2ndWestEdgepointArray;
01416                   usArraySize = gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize;
01417                   if( !usArraySize )
01418                         AssertMsg( 0, String( "Sector %c%d level %d doesn't have any isolated west mapedgepoints. KM:1", 
01419                                                        gWorldSectorY + 'A' - 1, gWorldSectorX, gbWorldSectorZ ) );
01420                   break;
01421       }
01422       if( !usArraySize )
01423       {
01424             return NOWHERE;
01425       }
01426 
01427       //Check the initial gridno, to see if it is available and an edgepoint.
01428       fReserved = FALSE;
01429       for( i = 0; i < gsReservedIndex; i++ )
01430       {
01431             if( gpReservedGridNos[ i ] == sGridNo )
01432             {
01433                   fReserved = TRUE;
01434                   break;
01435             }
01436       }
01437       if( !fReserved )
01438       {     //Not reserved, so see if we can find this gridno in the edgepoint array.
01439             for( i = 0 ; i < usArraySize; i++ )
01440             {
01441                   if( psArray[ i ] == sGridNo )
01442                   { //Yes, the gridno is in the edgepoint array.
01443                         gpReservedGridNos[ gsReservedIndex ] = sGridNo;
01444                         gsReservedIndex++;
01445                         return sGridNo;
01446                   }
01447             }
01448       }
01449 
01450       //spiral outwards, until we find an unreserved mapedgepoint.
01451       //
01452       // 09 08 07 06
01453       // 10 01 00 05
01454       // 11 02 03 04
01455       // 12 13 14 15 ..
01456       sRadius = 1;
01457       sDirection = WORLD_COLS;
01458       sOriginalGridNo = sGridNo;
01459       while( sRadius < (INT16)(gbWorldSectorZ ? 30 : 10) )
01460       {
01461             sGridNo = sOriginalGridNo + (-1 - WORLD_COLS)*sRadius; //start at the TOP-LEFT gridno
01462             for( iDirectionLoop = 0; iDirectionLoop < 4; iDirectionLoop++ )
01463             {
01464                   switch( iDirectionLoop )
01465                   {
01466                         case 0:     sDirection = WORLD_COLS;      break;
01467                         case 1:     sDirection = 1;                                 break;
01468                         case 2:     sDirection = -WORLD_COLS;     break;
01469                         case 3:     sDirection = -1;                          break;
01470                   }
01471                   sDistance = sRadius * 2;
01472                   while( sDistance-- )
01473                   {
01474                         sGridNo += sDirection;
01475                         if( sGridNo < 0 || sGridNo >= WORLD_MAX )
01476                               continue; 
01477                         //Check the gridno, to see if it is available and an edgepoint.
01478                         fReserved = FALSE;
01479                         for( i = 0; i < gsReservedIndex; i++ )
01480                         {
01481                               if( gpReservedGridNos[ i ] == sGridNo )
01482                               {
01483                                     fReserved = TRUE;
01484                                     break;
01485                               }
01486                         }
01487                         if( !fReserved )
01488                         {     //Not reserved, so see if we can find this gridno in the edgepoint array.
01489                               for( i = 0 ; i < usArraySize; i++ )
01490                               {
01491                                     if( psArray[ i ] == sGridNo )
01492                                     { //Yes, the gridno is in the edgepoint array.
01493                                           gpReservedGridNos[ gsReservedIndex ] = sGridNo;
01494                                           gsReservedIndex++;
01495                                           return sGridNo;
01496                                     }
01497                               }
01498                         }
01499                   }
01500             }
01501             sRadius++;
01502       }
01503       return NOWHERE ;
01504 }
01505 
01506 #define EDGE_OF_MAP_SEARCH 5
01507 BOOLEAN VerifyEdgepoint( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT16 sEdgepoint )
01508 {
01509       INT32       iSearchRange;
01510       INT16       sMaxLeft, sMaxRight, sMaxUp, sMaxDown, sXOffset, sYOffset;
01511       INT16       sGridNo;
01512       INT8        bDirection;
01513 
01514       pSoldier->sGridNo = sEdgepoint;
01515 
01516       iSearchRange = EDGE_OF_MAP_SEARCH;
01517 
01518       // determine maximum horizontal limits
01519       sMaxLeft  = min( iSearchRange, (pSoldier->sGridNo % MAXCOL));
01520       //NumMessage("sMaxLeft = ",sMaxLeft);
01521       sMaxRight = min( iSearchRange, MAXCOL - ((pSoldier->sGridNo % MAXCOL) + 1));
01522       //NumMessage("sMaxRight = ",sMaxRight);
01523 
01524       // determine maximum vertical limits
01525       sMaxUp   = min( iSearchRange, (pSoldier->sGridNo / MAXROW));
01526       //NumMessage("sMaxUp = ",sMaxUp);
01527       sMaxDown = min( iSearchRange, MAXROW - ((pSoldier->sGridNo / MAXROW) + 1));
01528 
01529       // Call FindBestPath to set flags in all locations that we can
01530       // walk into within range.  We have to set some things up first...
01531 
01532       // set the distance limit of the square region
01533       gubNPCDistLimit = EDGE_OF_MAP_SEARCH;
01534 
01535       // reset the "reachable" flags in the region we're looking at
01536       for (sYOffset = -sMaxUp; sYOffset <= sMaxDown; sYOffset++)
01537       {
01538             for (sXOffset = -sMaxLeft; sXOffset <= sMaxRight; sXOffset++)
01539             {
01540                   sGridNo = sEdgepoint + sXOffset + (MAXCOL * sYOffset);
01541                   gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].uiFlags &= ~(MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE);
01542             }
01543       }
01544 
01545       FindBestPath( pSoldier, NOWHERE, pSoldier->bLevel, WALKING, COPYREACHABLE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE );
01546 
01547       // Turn off the "reachable" flag for the current location
01548       // so we don't consider it
01549       //gpWorldLevelData[sEdgepoint].uiFlags &= ~(MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE);
01550 
01551       // SET UP DOUBLE-LOOP TO STEP THROUGH POTENTIAL GRID #s
01552       for (sYOffset = -sMaxUp; sYOffset <= sMaxDown; sYOffset++)
01553       {
01554             for (sXOffset = -sMaxLeft; sXOffset <= sMaxRight; sXOffset++)
01555             {
01556                   // calculate the next potential gridno
01557                   sGridNo = sEdgepoint + sXOffset + (MAXCOL * sYOffset);
01558 
01559                   if (!(gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE))
01560                   {
01561                         continue;
01562                   }
01563 
01564                   if (GridNoOnEdgeOfMap( sGridNo, &bDirection ) )
01565                   {
01566                         // ok!
01567                         return TRUE;
01568                   }
01569             }
01570       }
01571 
01572       // no spots right on edge of map within 5 tiles
01573       return FALSE;
01574 }
01575 
01576 BOOLEAN EdgepointsClose( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sEdgepoint1, INT16 sEdgepoint2 )
01577 {
01578       INT32       iSearchRange;
01579       INT16       sMaxLeft, sMaxRight, sMaxUp, sMaxDown, sXOffset, sYOffset;
01580       INT16       sGridNo;
01581 
01582       pSoldier->sGridNo = sEdgepoint1;
01583 
01584       if( gWorldSectorX == 14 && gWorldSectorY == 9 && !gbWorldSectorZ )
01585       { //BRUTAL CODE  -- special case map.
01586             iSearchRange = 250;
01587       }
01588       else
01589       {
01590             iSearchRange = EDGE_OF_MAP_SEARCH;
01591       }
01592 
01593       // determine maximum horizontal limits
01594       sMaxLeft  = min( iSearchRange, (pSoldier->sGridNo % MAXCOL));
01595       //NumMessage("sMaxLeft = ",sMaxLeft);
01596       sMaxRight = min( iSearchRange, MAXCOL - ((pSoldier->sGridNo % MAXCOL) + 1));
01597       //NumMessage("sMaxRight = ",sMaxRight);
01598 
01599       // determine maximum vertical limits
01600       sMaxUp   = min( iSearchRange, (pSoldier->sGridNo / MAXROW));
01601       //NumMessage("sMaxUp = ",sMaxUp);
01602       sMaxDown = min( iSearchRange, MAXROW - ((pSoldier->sGridNo / MAXROW) + 1));
01603 
01604       // Call FindBestPath to set flags in all locations that we can
01605       // walk into within range.  We have to set some things up first...
01606 
01607       // set the distance limit of the square region
01608       gubNPCDistLimit = (UINT8)iSearchRange;
01609 
01610       // reset the "reachable" flags in the region we're looking at
01611       for (sYOffset = -sMaxUp; sYOffset <= sMaxDown; sYOffset++)
01612       {
01613             for (sXOffset = -sMaxLeft; sXOffset <= sMaxRight; sXOffset++)
01614             {
01615                   sGridNo = sEdgepoint1 + sXOffset + (MAXCOL * sYOffset);
01616                   gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].uiFlags &= ~(MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE);
01617             }
01618       }
01619 
01620       if( FindBestPath( pSoldier, sEdgepoint2, pSoldier->bLevel, WALKING, COPYREACHABLE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) )
01621       {
01622             return TRUE;
01623       }
01624       return FALSE;
01625 }
01626 
01627 UINT8 CalcMapEdgepointClassInsertionCode( INT16 sGridNo )
01628 {
01629       SOLDIERTYPE Soldier;
01630       INT32             iLoop;
01631       INT16             *psEdgepointArray1, *psEdgepointArray2;
01632       INT32             iEdgepointArraySize1, iEdgepointArraySize2;
01633       INT16             sClosestSpot1 = NOWHERE, sClosestDist1 = 0x7FFF, sTempDist;
01634       INT16             sClosestSpot2 = NOWHERE, sClosestDist2 = 0x7FFF;
01635       BOOLEAN           fPrimaryValid = FALSE, fSecondaryValid = FALSE;
01636 
01637       memset( &Soldier, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
01638       Soldier.bTeam = 1;
01639       Soldier.sGridNo = sGridNo;
01640 
01641   if( gMapInformation.sIsolatedGridNo == -1 )
01642       { //If the map has no isolated area, then all edgepoints are primary.
01643             return INSERTION_CODE_PRIMARY_EDGEINDEX;
01644       }
01645 
01646       switch( gubTacticalDirection )
01647       {
01648             case NORTH:
01649                   psEdgepointArray1 = gps1stNorthEdgepointArray;
01650                   iEdgepointArraySize1 = gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize;
01651                   psEdgepointArray2 = gps2ndNorthEdgepointArray;
01652                   iEdgepointArraySize2 = gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize;
01653                   break;
01654             case EAST:
01655                   psEdgepointArray1 = gps1stEastEdgepointArray;
01656                   iEdgepointArraySize1 = gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize;
01657                   psEdgepointArray2 = gps2ndEastEdgepointArray;
01658                   iEdgepointArraySize2 = gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize;
01659                   break;
01660             case SOUTH:
01661                   psEdgepointArray1 = gps1stSouthEdgepointArray;
01662                   iEdgepointArraySize1 = gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize;
01663                   psEdgepointArray2 = gps2ndSouthEdgepointArray;
01664                   iEdgepointArraySize2 = gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize;
01665                   break;
01666             case WEST:
01667                   psEdgepointArray1 = gps1stWestEdgepointArray;
01668                   iEdgepointArraySize1 = gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize;
01669                   psEdgepointArray2 = gps2ndWestEdgepointArray;
01670                   iEdgepointArraySize2 = gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize;
01671                   break;
01672             default:
01673                   // WTF???
01674                   return INSERTION_CODE_PRIMARY_EDGEINDEX;
01675       }
01676 
01677       // Do a 2D search to find the closest map edgepoint and 
01678       // try to create a path there
01679       for ( iLoop = 0; iLoop < iEdgepointArraySize1; iLoop++ )
01680       {
01681             sTempDist = PythSpacesAway( sGridNo, psEdgepointArray1[ iLoop ] );
01682             if ( sTempDist < sClosestDist1 )
01683             {
01684                   sClosestDist1 = sTempDist;
01685                   sClosestSpot1 = psEdgepointArray1[ iLoop ];
01686             }
01687       }
01688       for ( iLoop = 0; iLoop < iEdgepointArraySize2; iLoop++ )
01689       {
01690             sTempDist = PythSpacesAway( sGridNo, psEdgepointArray2[ iLoop ] );
01691             if ( sTempDist < sClosestDist2 )
01692             {
01693                   sClosestDist2 = sTempDist;
01694                   sClosestSpot2 = psEdgepointArray2[ iLoop ];
01695             }
01696       }
01697 
01698       // set the distance limit of the square region
01699       gubNPCDistLimit = 15;
01700 
01701       if( !sClosestDist1 || FindBestPath( &Soldier, sClosestSpot1, 0, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) )
01702       {
01703             fPrimaryValid = TRUE;
01704       }
01705       if( !sClosestDist2 || FindBestPath( &Soldier, sClosestSpot2, 0, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) )
01706       {
01707             fSecondaryValid = TRUE;
01708       }
01709 
01710       if( fPrimaryValid == fSecondaryValid )
01711       {
01712             if( sClosestDist2 < sClosestDist1 )
01713             {
01714                   return INSERTION_CODE_SECONDARY_EDGEINDEX;
01715             }
01716             return INSERTION_CODE_PRIMARY_EDGEINDEX;
01717       }
01718       if( fPrimaryValid )
01719       {
01720             return INSERTION_CODE_PRIMARY_EDGEINDEX;
01721       }
01722       return INSERTION_CODE_SECONDARY_EDGEINDEX;
01723 }

01728 void ShowMapEdgepoints()
01729 {
01730       INT32 i, usIllegal1 = 0, usIllegal2 = 0;
01731       for( i = 0 ; i < gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
01732       {
01733             if( gps1stNorthEdgepointArray[ i ] != -1 )
01734             {
01735                   AddTopmostToTail( gps1stNorthEdgepointArray[ i ], FIRSTPOINTERS5 );
01736             }
01737             else
01738             {
01739                   usIllegal1++;
01740             }
01741       }
01742       for( i = 0 ; i < gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
01743       {
01744             if( gps1stEastEdgepointArray[ i ] != -1 )
01745             {
01746                   AddTopmostToTail( gps1stEastEdgepointArray[ i ], FIRSTPOINTERS5 );
01747             }
01748             else
01749             {
01750                   usIllegal1++;
01751             }
01752       }
01753       for( i = 0 ; i < gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
01754       {
01755             if( gps1stSouthEdgepointArray[ i ] != -1 )
01756             {
01757                   AddTopmostToTail( gps1stSouthEdgepointArray[ i ], FIRSTPOINTERS5 );
01758             }
01759             else
01760             {
01761                   usIllegal1++;
01762             }
01763       }
01764       for( i = 0 ; i < gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
01765       {
01766             if( gps1stWestEdgepointArray[ i ] != -1 )
01767             {
01768                   AddTopmostToTail( gps1stWestEdgepointArray[ i ], FIRSTPOINTERS5 );
01769             }
01770             else
01771             {
01772                   usIllegal1++;
01773             }
01774       }
01775 
01776       for( i = 0 ; i < gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
01777       {
01778             if( gps2ndNorthEdgepointArray[ i ] != -1 )
01779             {
01780                   AddTopmostToTail( gps2ndNorthEdgepointArray[ i ], FIRSTPOINTERS6 );
01781             }
01782             else
01783             {
01784                   usIllegal2++;
01785             }
01786       }
01787       for( i = 0 ; i < gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
01788       {
01789             if( gps2ndEastEdgepointArray[ i ] != -1 )
01790             {
01791                   AddTopmostToTail( gps2ndEastEdgepointArray[ i ], FIRSTPOINTERS6 );
01792             }
01793             else
01794             {
01795                   usIllegal2++;
01796             }
01797       }
01798       for( i = 0 ; i < gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
01799       {
01800             if( gps2ndSouthEdgepointArray[ i ] != -1 )
01801             {
01802                   AddTopmostToTail( gps2ndSouthEdgepointArray[ i ], FIRSTPOINTERS6 );
01803             }
01804             else
01805             {
01806                   usIllegal2++;
01807             }
01808       }
01809       for( i = 0 ; i < gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize; i++ )
01810       {
01811             if( gps2ndWestEdgepointArray[ i ] != -1 )
01812             {
01813                   AddTopmostToTail( gps2ndWestEdgepointArray[ i ], FIRSTPOINTERS6 );
01814             }
01815             else
01816             {
01817                   usIllegal2++;
01818             }
01819       }
01820       if( !usIllegal1 && !usIllegal2 )
01821       {
01822             ScreenMsg( 0, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Showing display of map edgepoints" );
01823       }
01824       else
01825       {
01826             ScreenMsg( 0, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Showing display of map edgepoints (%d illegal primary, %d illegal secondary)" );
01827       }
01828       ScreenMsg( 0, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"N:%d:%d E:%d:%d S:%d:%d W:%d:%d", 
01829             gus1stNorthEdgepointArraySize, gus2ndNorthEdgepointArraySize, 
01830             gus1stEastEdgepointArraySize,  gus2ndEastEdgepointArraySize, 
01831             gus1stSouthEdgepointArraySize, gus2ndSouthEdgepointArraySize, 
01832             gus1stWestEdgepointArraySize,  gus2ndWestEdgepointArraySize );
01833 }

01844             }
